plot: That he may not have to care for the daughter of his deceased son, Jim Beadles, a wealthy bachelor and ranchman, signs a five-year contract with a neighbor, Joan Roach, for her services. ...
title: The Miser
plot_es: That he may not have to care for the daughter of his deceased son, Jim Beadles, a wealthy bachelor and ranchman, signs a five-year contract with a neighbor, Joan Roach, for her services. ...
